backend/main.mo: Main backend actor implementing file upload/download with chunked storage, user profiles, access control via mixins, and file metadata management including sharing and download tracking.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting three features: removing file type restrictions on upload, updating UI messaging for any file type, and handling non-media file previews on the share page.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Pre-existing summaries of frontend files describing the React app structure, components, pages, hooks, and styling with details about authentication, file upload/sharing, and UI elements.
frontend/index.css: Empty CSS file (content truncated or removed).
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with LookyLoo title, favicon reference, and script tag loading the React app from main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component configuring TanStack Router with routes for upload, my-uploads, and share pages, wrapped in ThemeProvider with AuthGate protection and toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthGate.ts: Authentication guard component that displays a login card with animated video and messaging when user is not authenticated, otherwise renders protected children.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button component using Internet Identity with loading states, query cache clearing on logout, and updated sign-in text.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal dialog prompting new authenticated users to enter their display name, with form submission handling and no close button to enforce completion.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Main layout component with header (logo, navigation, login button), footer (GeekGoat logo and social links), and outlet for page content, plus ProfileSetupModal integration.
frontend/src/components/upload/KeyfilePi: Empty component file (content not provided or removed).
frontend/src/components/uploads/UploadsL: React component that displays a list of uploaded files with metadata, share links, and delete functionality. Includes empty state UI and file type icons for images, videos, and documents.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom React hook that manages the backend actor instance using React Query, handling authentication state and initializing access control with an admin token from URL parameters.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context provider and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing login state, identity persistence, and delegation validation with configurable AuthClient options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for backend operations including user profile management, file uploads with chunking (500KB chunks), file metadata retrieval, and download functionality.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light and dark theme colors, including primary, secondary, muted, destructive, and chart color definitions.
frontend/src/lib/arweaveClient.ts: Empty file, likely placeholder for Arweave blockchain integration client.
frontend/src/lib/shareLinks.ts: Utility function that generates shareable URLs for files by combining the current origin with a share ID path.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Utility functions including cn() for merging Tailwind classes and formatBytes() for human-readable file size formatting.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query, Internet Identity provider, and renders the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/MyUploadsPage.tsx: Page component displaying the authenticated user's uploaded files with loading states, error handling, and delete functionality using UploadsList component.
frontend/src/pages/SharePage.tsx: Public file sharing page that fetches file metadata and chunks by ID, reassembles chunked files into blobs for preview/download, and tracks download counts.
frontend/src/pages/UploadPage.tsx: React component for file upload page with drag-and-drop support, 2MB file size limit, progress tracking, and share link generation after successful upload.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting and managing URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom color scheme using OKLCH color space, extended theme settings, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project metadata tracking completed features for removing file type restrictions and updating UI to support any file type uploads beyond just media files.
